corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: Many people are deeply concerned about the neglect of crofting land .
Mr Hamilton said : ` I am deeply concerned at what you have told me and I shall ask for immediate steps to be taken for normal decencies to be observed . "
Kagan was deeply concerned that his access to the child was limited .
The president was more concerned about the loss of jobs .
People are becoming more and more concerned about the healthiness of their diet and way of life .
` To be honest , I 'm more concerned about getting a good night 's sleep , " says a pregnant woman , who 's working full-time at a demanding job .
Most were more concerned with the courts being ` too lenient " .
` We 're particularly concerned about the increase in incidents involving youngsters of 11 and 12 , especially girls , " said founder Regina Dollar .

She was particularly concerned when , shortly before her wedding day , she discovered that Prince Charles planned to give his friend a bracelet inscribed with their nicknames ` Fred " and ` Gladys " .
` I 'm gratified to find you so concerned for my welfare , Li Yuan .
Relatives , too , seem concerned about lack of communication and the ` unavailability of the nurses " .
They do care about others and are concerned about their country 's future . "
He was concerned that to include the large Asian countries in such a scheme would introduce problems that the small nations could find difficult to resolve .
These problems can vary in intensity from parents concerned about how to wean , to parents ' neglecting and underfeeding their children .
He was concerned that parents would want to see their children doing ` real " maths , and advised injecting investigations into the existing syllabus instead .
That is encouraging , yet we are concerned that people are still getting fatter .
We are very concerned to learn of any shortfall in standards and this is why we want to hear from you if you encounter any problems .
No-one seemed concerned that the museums , the temples of culture and art , were subjected to such indignities .
I was a little concerned that you put so much emphasis on return to work .
He was concerned that the room must be left just as Durance would have wished .
Mr Carruthers said that the vast majority of evidence was over but acknowledged he was concerned that Mr McTear would not be able to conclude his testimony .
I became concerned when I saw my husband becoming a different person .
Jose , the refuge guardian , was concerned when Jeremy did n't return to Elola on the evening of Sunday , October 21 -- he had left his camping gear behind in the hut .
He 's concerned what will happen to me . "
In 1986 the local authority became concerned about injuries which D had sustained and they obtained a place of safety order .
How could she be concerned about the choice of jam ?
I am concerned about my seven-year-old son .
Because they 're concerned about America 's oil dependence , senior government officials have come to rub shoulders with the advocates of conservation and alternative power sources .
A third group of backbenchers is concerned at cross-media ownership in the new channels under the bill .
The Training Sub-Committee is extremely concerned at the amount of pressure Trainers are under and feel there is an urgent need for a group of people to begin training now .
David is concerned at the length of time he says it took for an ambulance to arrive .
Everyone is terribly concerned at the moment ; we had thought that the security at St Helier was tighter than in most other hospitals .
John 's father came down from Cheltenham to see her , grieving and concerned for her future .
A son should be concerned for his father 's health . "
` Are you telling me you were concerned for my soul ? " she mocked .
Police became increasingly concerned for their prisoner 's health over the weekend .
Concerned as to whether he was adequately looking after himself , but especially concerned as to his future as a writer .
Maria 's ( 3.5 years ) parents were concerned because of her severe headbanging at home .
In the aftermath of the war the government was said to be concerned over Turkey 's increasingly prominent international role .
The note said Imro was concerned there might be ` similar undetected shenanigans " in other occupational pension schemes .
Elaine 's voice was concerned but deep inside she hoped he would not decide to go to the party .
In this respect , it would be helpful if our political leaders were mute , rather than eloquently `` concerned .

The United States is concerned that if Iran stockpiled enriched uranium , it might , in the future , withdraw from the NPT ( as North Korea has ) and then build nuclear weapons rapidly , perhaps even in a matter of months .
The US is concerned that Iran may have or acquire an unsafeguarded enrichment facility for which it might get parts from Eastern Europe ( PPNN , International Herald Tribune , 1/28/91 ) .

However , the US is concerned with the indirect assistance Iran could receive and is concerned that it is probably covertly seeking the construction of uranium conversion and enrichment facilities , other technical know-how , and technicians .

The United States is concerned that if Iran stockpiled enriched uranium , it might , in the future , withdraw from the NPT ( as North Korea has ) and then build nuclear weapons rapidly , perhaps even in a matter of months .

The release of nerve gas on the Tokyo subway by a Japanese cult on March 20, 1995 , the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001 , and the sending of anthrax - tainted letters have made policymakers and the general public concerned that terrorists could use chemical or biological weapons ( CBW ) to inflict mass casualties .

The release of nerve gas on the Tokyo subway by a Japanese cult on March 20, 1995 , the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001 , and the sending of anthrax - tainted letters have made policymakers and the general public concerned that terrorists could use chemical or biological weapons ( CBW ) to inflict mass casualties .
How vulnerable is the United States to BW terrorism , and what types of attacks should it be most concerned about ?
Paula_Zahn : Turning our attention now to something that has a lot of folks concerned .
